list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a person who is blamed for the wrongdoings, mistakes, or faults of others, especially for reasons of expediency.
(in the Bible) a goat sent into the wilderness after the Jewish chief priest had symbolically laid the sins of the people upon it (Lev. 16).

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: few things are harder for kids to bear than being scapegoated
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Vài điều khó gây khó khăn hơn là bị di truyền
